com.honeywell.aidc

Interface AidcManager.BarcodeDeviceListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    AidcManager

    public static interface AidcManager.BarcodeDeviceListener
extends EventListener
    Used in conjunction with AidcManager.addBarcodeDeviceListener(BarcodeDeviceListener).

    Registered listeners will be called via #onScannerDeviceEvent(BarcodeDeviceListener) when a new scanner is connected or disconnected

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBarcodeDeviceConnectionEvent(BarcodeDeviceConnectionEvent event)
      Called when a Barcode Device is added or removed from the device.

    • Method Detail

      • onBarcodeDeviceConnectionEvent

        void onBarcodeDeviceConnectionEvent(BarcodeDeviceConnectionEvent event)
        Called when a Barcode Device is added or removed from the device.
        Parameters:
        event - Contains information about the connected Barcode Device
